Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Haniff', 3: "Oh, hi, Rolla. Didn't expect to see you here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Haniff looks down at the white flowers Rolla is holding and asks.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haniff', 3: 'Are you here to offer flowers too?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rolla', 3: 'Do you also have a family member who...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haniff', 3: 'A family member... Not really, but kind of like my older brothers and sisters, I guess?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haniff', 3: "Haha, I'm just paying respect to those who sacrificed their lives.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haniff', 3: "Don't waste your time on me here. I'll get going first.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Clutching the bouquet in her hands, Rolla makes her way toward the memorial monument.'}
